divs: Sighting DetailsHot glowing lights in formation then making triangle and one by one flying south then turning east and disappearing. Not particularly fast except after the turn This is the second time I have witnessed the. Previously near Ohio turnpike on I77 about 1 month ago. Exact same thing.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Massillon
There were no other sightings in Massillon on or around August 15th 2013
